word: G3970 - πατροπαράδοτος - patroparádotos - pat-rop-ar-ad'-ot-os - Received by tradition from fathers

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: Received by tradition from fathers
handed down from one's fathers or ancestors
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From G3962 and a derivative of G3860 (in the sense of handing over or down); traditionary: - received by tradition from fathers.
